The Philippine Postal Savings Bank ( Postbank ) has selected IDEALINVENT 's next generation banking platform ConnectCoreTM to implement vital core banking functions .
Postbank , established in 1906 , operates as a thrift and government depositary bank and has chosen the GL , Loans and Microfinance modules from ConnectCoreTM - Core bank .

This solution will enable the bank in achieving their 5 year strategic objectives of doubling the number of branches and providing loan services to the unbanked through more than 1,900 post offices located throughout the country .

A0: a thrift and government depositary bank

One of the most important considerations that led to the bank choosing ConnectCoreTM was the product 's demonstrated high stability and ease of configuration .
